arts.ttl: ‘He always placed the French team above everything’ – Didier Deschamps reflects on Olivier Giroud’s France career
arts.sum: Ahead of Sunday’s UEFA Nations League match against Croatia, France’s manager is paying tribute to France’s record goalscorer. Olivier Giroud (38) will be honoured on Sunday ahead of France’s decisive…

arts.ttl: David Martinez continues to tear up MLS: Watch the 19-year-old's stunning goal and highlights from LAFC's win
arts.sum: Goals from David Martinez in the first half and Aaron Long in the second sealed a crucial victory at Sporting Park . LAFC took full advantage of facing one of the weakest teams in the Western Conference, securing their third win of the 2025 season.
